mapper.select: select * from (select * from (select a.pd_no, b.userid, c.main_img, c.s_no, c.price, c.pd_name, d.s_name from wishlist a, register b, product c, store d where a.userid = b.userid and a.pd_no = c.pd_no and c.s_no = d.s_no order by a.pd_no desc) where userid=#{userid}) where rownum < 4
